name: JRL ONYX Professional Cordless Hair Clipper - Black #FF 2020C-B (Dual Voltage)
shortDescription: Professional cordless hair clipper with dual voltage capability
description: The JRL ONYX Professional Cordless Hair Clipper in sleek black delivers exceptional cutting performance with its powerful rotary motor and precision-ground blades. Designed for professional barbers and stylists, this clipper features dual voltage capability for worldwide use. The ergonomic design ensures comfort during extended cutting sessions while maintaining consistent power throughout use.
features: Professional rotary motor for consistent power
Cordless operation for freedom of movement

name: JRL GHOST Professional Cordless Hair Clipper - White #2020C-B-W (Dual Voltage)
shortDescription: Professional cordless clipper in elegant white finish with dual voltage
description: The JRL GHOST Professional Cordless Hair Clipper in pristine white combines cutting-edge technology with stunning aesthetics. This professional-grade clipper features the same powerful performance as the ONYX in a distinctive white finish. Perfect for barbers who want to make a statement while delivering exceptional cuts. The dual voltage capability ensures reliable performance worldwide.
features: Elegant white finish for distinctive style

name: JRL ONYX Professional Cordless Hair Trimmer - Black #FF 2020T-B (Dual Voltage)
shortDescription: Professional cordless trimmer with dual voltage for precision detailing
description: The JRL ONYX Professional Cordless Hair Trimmer in sleek black is engineered for precision detailing and finishing work. Featuring a powerful motor and sharp T-blade, this trimmer excels at creating clean lines, edge-ups, and intricate designs. The dual voltage capability makes it perfect for professional use worldwide.

name: JRL GHOST2 Hair Clipper, Trimmer, Shaver Bundle #GH2401-2
shortDescription: Complete professional grooming bundle with clipper, trimmer, and shaver
description: The JRL GHOST2 Bundle is the ultimate professional grooming collection, featuring three essential tools: a powerful clipper for bulk cutting, a precision trimmer for detailed work, and a smooth-finish shaver for ultra-clean results. This comprehensive set includes everything needed for complete haircuts and grooming services. Each tool features advanced motor technology and premium construction for reliable professional performance.

name: JRL Professional X Lamborghini Diamante Cordless Clipper and Trimmer Combo - Gold
shortDescription: Luxury Lamborghini collaboration clipper and trimmer combo in gold
description: The JRL Professional X Lamborghini Diamante Cordless Combo in stunning gold represents the pinnacle of luxury grooming tools. This exclusive collaboration merges JRL's professional expertise with Lamborghini's legendary design philosophy. Featuring both a powerful clipper and precision trimmer, this limited-edition set embodies Italian craftsmanship and automotive excellence. The luxurious gold finish and diamond-inspired design elements make this a collector's item and the ultimate professional statement piece.
features: Luxurious gold finish with premium aesthetics

specifications.setIncludes: Diamante Clipper + Diamante Trimmer + Premium Case

name: JRL Professional X Lamborghini Diamante Cordless Clipper and Trimmer Combo - Black
shortDescription: Luxury Lamborghini collaboration clipper and trimmer combo in black
description: The JRL Professional X Lamborghini Diamante Cordless Combo in sophisticated black represents the ultimate fusion of automotive luxury and professional grooming excellence. This exclusive collaboration brings Lamborghini's iconic design language to JRL's proven professional performance. Featuring both a powerful clipper and precision trimmer in sleek black finish, this limited-edition set combines Italian sophistication with cutting-edge grooming technology. The Diamante series showcases premium materials and meticulous attention to detail worthy of the Lamborghini name.
features: Sophisticated black finish with luxury styling
